activity.name:
New Mexico Statute allows a customer 30 days from the date of purchase to complete the transfer of ownership of a vehicle or vessel.
(Late Transfer Penalty (code 70) (ยง66-3-103(B))
activity.description:
New Mexico Statute allows a customer 30 days from the date of purchase to complete the transfer of ownership of a vehicle or vessel.
(Late Transfer Penalty (code 70) (ยง66-3-103(B))

activity.name:
AVOID FINES AND PENALTIES
Titling and registering a vehicle or vessel within the 30-day time frame will help the customer avoid late fines and penalties.
activity.description:
AVOID FINES AND PENALTIES
Titling and registering a vehicle or vessel within the 30-day time frame will help the customer avoid late fines and penalties.

activity.name: When the customer receives a Notice of Additional Requirements Letter, they have 10 days to return with the required document or information to avoid late registration penalties and late transfer fees.
activity.description: When the customer receives a Notice of Additional Requirements Letter, they have 10 days to return with the required document or information to avoid late registration penalties and late transfer fees.

activity.name: What if a customer waits until the last minute? If a customer comes in near the end of the 30-day period and has to return because of missing documents or information, he will probably be charged the late transfer fee.
activity.description: What if a customer waits until the last minute? If a customer comes in near the end of the 30-day period and has to return because of missing documents or information, he will probably be charged the late transfer fee.

activity.name: But that decision is up to your supervisor.
activity.description: But that decision is up to your supervisor.

activity.name:
Terri Rose Terri is missing some of the documentation to title and register her vehicle.
A Notice of Additional Requirements Letter has been generated.
activity.description:
Terri Rose Terri is missing some of the documentation to title and register her vehicle.
A Notice of Additional Requirements Letter has been generated.

activity.name: 29 Days? She waited 29 days after she purchased her vehicle to come in for the transfer.
activity.description: 29 Days? She waited 29 days after she purchased her vehicle to come in for the transfer.

activity.name: To Avoid the Penalty To avoid the penalty, Ms. Rose needs to return with her missing documentation by the end of the next business day.
activity.description: To Avoid the Penalty To avoid the penalty, Ms. Rose needs to return with her missing documentation by the end of the next business day.

activity.name: At this point, your supervisor can make a decision about the late transfer fee.
activity.description: At this point, your supervisor can make a decision about the late transfer fee.

activity.name: Tapestry allows a Manager to override late penalty fees and transfer fees if he determines that the 10 days should be extended.
activity.description: Tapestry allows a Manager to override late penalty fees and transfer fees if he determines that the 10 days should be extended.
